cause.description:
Global Warming: Something that Gore made a slide show about so he has an excuse to ask for peoples money.
The earth goes through natural warming and cooling trends. Right now we are in a warming trend. Back in the mid 1900's, they were screaming about global cooling, wtf!? So shut up.
PLEASE NOTE: Don't donate, because we don't want that crazy lady to have our money, I just couldn't find a more laughable cause for money to go to.
1. Laugh at Al Gore
2. Destroy every copy of An Inconvenient Truth in existence
3. Make "I Heart Global Warming" shirts
cause.name: Anti-Anti Global Warming
